citations.narrative:
At least 12 of the 7020s reviewed for the 2023 acquisitions have the name of the seller but they do not contain the
address of the seller. A 7020 shows a male tapier was acquired on 4/11/2023. It was not present at either of the animal
housing sites inspected since 4/11/2023 yet there is no disposition record present for this animal . The acquisition
/disposition records must contain the name and address of the person from whom the animal was purchased or otherwise
acquired and the name and address of the person whom the animal was sold or given . CORRECT BY : 10/10/23
This inspection was conducted at a site that is an office where only facility records are maintained
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with a facility employee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)(i) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
At least 12 of the 7020s reviewed  for the 2023 acquisitions have the name of the seller but they do not contain the 
address of the seller. A 7020 shows a male tapier was acquired on 4/11/2023. It was not present at either of the animal 
housing sites inspected since 4/11/2023 yet there is no disposition record present for this animal . The acquisition 
/disposition records must contain the name and address of the person from whom the animal was purchased or otherwise 
acquired and the name and address of the person whom the animal was sold or given . CORRECT BY : 10/10/23 
 
This inspection was conducted at a site that is an office where only facility records are maintained 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with a facility employee.
